issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: The Modules Window in Titanium Studio shows only the first 48 Modules installed. Any additional Module Works if inputted manually in tiapp.xml normally, just dosen't show in the attached Window.
fields.summary: Titanium Studio Modules Window Displays Max 48 Modules

comments.body: I have been able to scroll through hundreds of modules on this dialog box. May be those modules are on a different path? Do you have all the modules available at the same place?

Hi Ritu,

The Modules are located in: /Users/currentUser/Library/Application Support/Titanium/modules/...

There are more modules in the iOS/Android folders that are displayed in the snapshot. Also, when I install new Modules (they do not show in the window snapshot, but I can easily manually insert the module in the xml version of tiapp.xml.

There is another folder which also has Ti Modules (for older Ti Studios) in: /Library/Application Support/Titanium (though these do not show at all)

My modules are located in the same directory as yours and I can scroll through all of them (around 100). I can see you are using the latest Titanium Studio version as well. I also checked with the Engineering team and they confirm that there is no such limitation.
Resolving this ticket as we cannot reproduce this issue and there is no additional information to diagnose it further.
